00031 #include <FL/Fl_Device.H>
00032 
00038 class Fl_Clipboard_Writer : public Fl_Device {
00039 private:
00040 #ifdef __APPLE__
00041   int width, height;
00042   CFMutableDataRef pdfdata_;
00043 #endif
00044 
00045   void *gc;
00046   void traverse(Fl_Widget *widget);
00047   void translate(int x, int y);
00048   void untranslate(void);
00049 public:
00050 #ifdef __APPLE__
00051   inline void bounds(int *pwidth, int *pheight) {*pwidth = width; *pheight = height; }
00052 #endif
00053 
00054   Fl_Clipboard_Writer() {type_ = clipboard;};
00059   int start(int w, int h);
00065   void copy_widget(Fl_Widget* widget, int delta_x = 0, int delta_y = 0);
00067   int stop(void);
00068   Fl_Device *set_current(void);
